channel.title: Game Crashing after new update (12/16/2017)
channel.description: #### What happened? I joined a game and as soon as the loading screen went on, it crashed. Okay, I accepted that it could have been my PC, but no. I have entered 2 more games by now and it has crashed both times. I have, lastly, asked others about the problem and they are facing it too. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was supposed to be in a game right now. #### Steps to reproduce: Enter a game and wait until it crashes. #### Comments: It definitely has to do with the new update on 12/16/2017, since I played some hours before the update and it was going well. Thanks!

item.description:

item.title: Game Crashing after new update (12/16/2017)
item.dc:creator: deltaes
item.description:
What happened?

I joined a game and as soon as the loading screen went on, it crashed. Okay, I accepted that it could have been my PC, but no. I have entered 2 more games by now and it has crashed both times. I have, lastly, asked others about the problem and they are facing it too.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I was supposed to be in a game right now.

Steps to reproduce:

Enter a game and wait until it crashes.

Comments:

It definitely has to do with the new update on 12/16/2017, since I played some hours before the update and it was going well. Thanks!

Read full topic
